static inline int scanInt()
{
    int x=0;
    register char c=gc();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
    {
        c=gc();
    }
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=x*10+c-'0';
        c=gc();
    }
    return x;
}


static inline ll scanLong()
{
    ll x=0;
    register char c=gc();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
    {
        c=gc();
    }
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=x*10+c-'0';
        c=gc();
    }
    return x;
}










static inline void fastWrite(ll x)
{

  char s[21];
  int i=0;
  do
  {
      s[i++]=x%10+'0';
      x/=10;
  }while(x);
  --i;
  while(i>=0)
  {
      pc(s[i--]);
  }
  pc('\n');

}



int gcd(int x,int y)
{
return(y?gcd(y,x%y):x);
}

int f(int x,int y)
{
    int cnt=0;
    for(int i=x;i<=y;i++)
    {
        if(!(i%x))
            cnt++;
    }
    return cnt;
}

inline ll ans(ll x)
{
return((x*x-2)/2);
}

int main()
{
    int T;
    ll X;
    T=scanInt();
    while(T--)
    {
        X=scanLong();
        if(X==1)
        {
            pc('0');
            pc('\n');
            continue;
        }
        fastWrite(ans(X));
    }
    return 0;
}
